businessName: Neighborhood Mapping: How to Research Local Amenities and Demographics
aboutText: Choosing the right neighborhood is often more important than choosing the right house, since you can renovate a property but cannot easily change its surroundings. Neighborhood mapping involves systematically researching local amenities, demographic composition, and quality-of-life factors to understand what daily life will actually be like. By combining online mapping tools with on-the-ground exploration, prospective buyers can assess whether a community's character, services, and trajectory al
